item.description:
NHRuby is a group of people who are enthusiasts of the Ruby programming language and the Ruby on Rails web development framework. Please visit http://www.nhruby.org/ NHRuby also maintains the following mailing lists: * http://groups.google.com/group/nhruby-announce * http://groups.google.com/group/nhruby-discuss Follow up on twitter: http://twitter.com/nhruby

 

In 2012 we shut our doors and started a new group with a broader purpose: The NH Web Dev Group http://www.meetup.com/Web-Dev-Meetup/

 

We still discuss many Ruby-related topics in the larger group too, so sign up to attend a meeting. You'll find many people who work in Ruby do the same. Hope to see you there!
item.name: The NH Ruby and Rails Meetup
